description:
CO2 emissions driven SSP5-3.4 overshoot scenario simulation optionally extending to year 2300. The scenario branches from SSP5-8.5, an unmitigated baseline scenario, at the beginning of 2040 when substantially negative net emissions are applied.  All non-CO2 forcing should be identical to that in the ScenarioMIP experiments: ssp534-over and ssp534-over-ext.
If computational resources are sufficient, the esm-ssp534-over simulation should be continued for at least another 1000 years with year 2300 forcing; i.e., the forcing is held constant at year 2300 levels as the simulation continues for as long as possible (up to 5000 years). Include all anthropogenic, solar, and volcanic forcing. Anthropogenic forcing includes aerosol emissions, non-CO2 greenhouse gas emissions, and land use changes.  CO2 concentration calculated (i.e. emission driven).
rationale: Evaluate the Earth system response to carbon dioxide removal (CDR) in an overshoot climate change scenario.  Part of the CDR-overshoot experiment. The long-term extension is to better understand processes that are slow to equilibrate, for example ocean carbon and heat exchange or permafrost dynamics.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2040 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2040-2100 61 yrs min

requirements.description: Run from 2040 for a maximum of 5000 years.
requirements.label: 2040-7039 5000 yrs max

requirements.description: Impose RCP3.4 overshoot emissions.  Beginning in 2040, reduce emissions from the 8.5 W/m2 pathway to 3.4 W/m2 by 2100.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4-over, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP3.4 overshoot
requirements.label: SSP5 RCP34 overshoot emissions

requirements.description: Impose changing RCP3.4 overshoot land use including crops, pasture, urban area, vegetation and forest for SSP5.  Beginning in 2040, reduce forcings from 8.5 W/m2 pathway to 3.4 W/m2 by 2100.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4 overshoot, future, scenario, SSP5, RCP3.4, overshoot, Land Use
requirements.label: SSP5 RCP34-overshoot Land Use

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemistry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair production by galactic cosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation from esm-ssp585 simulation at the beginning of year 2040.
requirements.label: 2040esm-ssp585Init

requirements.description: Use a fully coupled Earth System Model which explicitly models the movement of Carbon through the Earth system.  Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with biogeochemistry.
requirements.keywords: AOGCM-BGC, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model with BioGeoChemistry, Earth System Model, ESM
requirements.label: AOGCM-BGC Configuration
